page.title: 07Clubs and organisations.
page.content: Our Cubs are held on Tuesday.It is taken by Mr.Price and his wife.In Cubs we start off by saying the grand howl. Secondly we give our subscriptions which are 15p.Then we have two games.Then we do some badge work. Finally we have another two games. {Gym Club.}Gym club is held every Thursday down at the village hall.It is held by Tony Bean.To go in you have to pay thirty pence.First of all we do some warm ups then we get the apparatus out and do some work.We do handstands, cartwheels,headstands and things like that.After about three quarters of an hour we finish. {Guides and Brownies.}They meet on Wednesday evenings.We do badges, games knots,first aid,parties and discos. We go for walks,treasure hunts and we do compass work. We go on pack holiday.
